攷字的基本解释

攷
kǎo
同“考”①攷③。

攷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kǎo］
［《廣韻》苦浩切，上晧，溪。］
“考1”的古字。
(1)敲，拷击。
(2)考察，考核。
(3)辅佐者。
(4)旧称已死的父亲。
(5)见“攷攷”。

攷字的康熙字典解释

【卯集下】【攴字部】　攷； 康熙笔画：6； 页码：页468第08
【集韻】考，古作攷。【周禮·天官·小宰】攷乃灋。餘詳考部。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kǎo］
["Guangyun" bitter and holy cut, Shanghao, Xi. ]
The ancient word "Test 1".
(1) Knock, torture.
(2) Inspection and assessment.
(3) Auxiliary.
(4) Formerly known as the dead father.
(5) See "Cao Kao".
test
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 2] [Department of Characters] 　 Kao; Kangxi Strokes: 6; Page Number: Page 468 08
[Jiyun] test, ancient writing test. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Xiao Zai】Kao Naihao. I detailed the examination department.
